bio: Lets make web3 the new world order!!!!
contributionDescription:
I have been a founder of 2 start ups, one of them was based on web3.
I can help in Governance, Developer Ecosystem and mainly in adoption of OP stack.
Knowledge and understanding the use case of the chain is most important.
I have been part of the blockchain since 2016, with LTC and XRP. 
My focus areas will be of End user experience, if they are liking the UI/UX interface, speed, rpc chains working efficiently and more.

https://www.forbes.com/sites/anniebrown/2020/11/19/mental-health--privacy-in-the-era-of-data-for-revenue-algorithmic-models/?sh=7f09c119577b
impactDescription:
More users on the platform.
Best way to market a good product is testimonial marketing, getting feedback posting it across the relevant platforms and organisations will make an impact in adoption and trial of the platform.
At the same time leadership in governance of what milestone should be picked up next in production will allow smooth deployments.
I will try bridge the gaps between user needs and business objectives.
pwCategorySuggestions: Governance & Tokens, Developer Ecosystem, End-User Experience
